item.description:
On October 8th come on down to a meeting to chat about storytelling. Share resources, experiences and your personal projects. Whatever your interest is in storytelling, I hope to see you there!

Also, anyone wavering on the show tonight, it should be a really great line-up and a good time. I hope to see you there too!

-Jess

group.name: Greater Boston and MA Storytelling Meetup Group

item.name: Storytelling chat at Somerville Public Library on College Ave
